biografia:
Nicolas Bourbaki
is the pseudonym of a group of
(
mainly
)
French mathematicians who publish an authoritative account of contemporary mathematics.
More information is available in two articles:
Bourbaki: the pre-war years
and
Bourbaki: the post-war years
The founding members of the organisation were:
Henri Cartan
Claude Chevalley
Jean Coulomb
Jean Delsarte
Jean Dieudonné
Charles Ehresmann
Szolem Mandelbrojt
René de Possel
André Weil
